title: Materials and Design 3rd Edition c2014 Ashby + Johnson txtbk
description:
Materials and Design: The Art and Science of Material Selection in Product Design, 3rd Edition (c2014), a textbook by Michael Ashby & Kara Johnson.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" https://www.elsevier.com/books/materials-and-design/ashby/978-0-08-098205-2" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> https://www.elsevier.com/books/materials-and-design/ashby/978-0-08-098205-2</a>

CONTENTS:
1. Introduction
2. What Influences Product Design?
3. Materiality, Design, and Creativity
4. Materials: The Stuff That Surrounds Us
5. Manufacturing: Shaping, Joining, and Surfaces
6. Form Follows Material
7. Material Selection
8. Materials and Sustainability
9. New Materials
10. Conclusions
Appendices: Selected Material Maps
Exercises
Practical Reference for Inspiration: Material Profiles - Shaping Profiles - Joining Profiles - Surface Profiles 

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF.
